Harry Zakour bụ onye ọchụnta ego dabere na Lebanọn-Ghanaị na onye bụbu onye njikwa egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye osote onye isi oche nke abụọ nke National Democratic Congress (2016) na onye nwe oge mgbasa ozi Montie FM
Onye isi oche nke Accra Hearts of Oak, a na-ahụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na-eme nke ọma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ghana football
Ihe kacha pụta ìhè bụ n'afọ 2000 mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ meriri Ghana Premier League, Ghana FA Cup, Africa CAF Champions League na Africa Super Cup.
